div.a: Skull & Bones: It's Not Just For White Dudes Anymore

div.div: For generations, the organization's alumni corps has granted a coterie of white, privileged, predominately heterosexual men easier entry into the upper echelons of American society. But that was then.

@timothypmurphy
3h ago

div.a: Can You Construct A Functional Joke About A 9-Year-Old At The Oscars?

div.div: So The Onion apologized today for one of their many, many Oscars jokes last night. Which one? The one that was nooooottttt good or okay. Nooo, the other one.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YwyW6Y&via=Digg&text=Can You Construct A Functional Joke About A 9-Year-Old At The Oscars?

div.a: Meet Cuba's (Possible) Next President

div.div: The long-ruling Castro brothers have plucked a bureaucrat from obscurity as their heir-apparent to rule Cuba, and named 2018 as the year of the transition.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VI0IRf&via=Digg&text=Meet Cuba's (Possible) Next President

div.div: THE BATTLE OF ANT-IETAM (DON'T BOO US)

div.a: War Of The Ants Intensifies

div.div: An aggressive species of ant may be losing ground in North America to a more aggressive — and potentially dangerous — species, according to a new study.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YtlvXA&via=Digg&text=War Of The Ants Intensifies

div.a: Spider-Man's Silk Really Could Stop A Train

div.div: In "Spider-Man 2," the superhero slings silk from his wrists to keep a runaway subway from plunging off the end of the tracks. Far-fetched as the scene is, a group of physics students says Spidey's webbing material, if it was truly as strong as a spider's silk, could indeed stop a train.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XxqSGW&via=Digg&text=Spider-Man's Silk Really Could Stop A Train

div.a: How To Hack Google's Two-Factor Authentication

div.div: An attacker can bypass Google’s two-step login verification, reset a user’s master password, and otherwise gain full account control, simply by capturing a user’s application-specific password (ASP).

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VItr8v&via=Digg&text=How To Hack Google's Two-Factor Authentication

div.a: This Is The Ridiculous Blood-Filled Taiwanese Animation Of Saturday's Huge NASCAR Crash

div.div: Saturday's crash in the NASCAR Nationwide Series Race at Daytona was truly awful. Now the Taiwanese animation has been released and it's more ridiculous than you could possibly imagine.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YwqmoP&via=Digg&text=This Is The Ridiculous Blood-Filled Taiwanese Animation Of Saturday's Huge NASCAR Crash

div.a: A Life Through Libraries

div.div: I am, in no small part, the sum of what libraries have made me.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YLmoe3&via=Digg&text=A Life Through Libraries

div.a: Researchers Fire Smartphone Into Space To See If Anyone Can Hear Them Scream

div.div: Researchers hope to use a purpose-built app to test the theory, immortalized in the film "Aliens," that "in space no-one can hear you scream."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XwW88Z&via=Digg&text=Researchers Fire Smartphone Into Space To See If Anyone Can Hear Them Scream

div.a: This Is the First Instagram From North Korea

div.div: Instagram has made its way into North Korea today after operator Koryolink opened its mobile data services to foreigners.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13GFQdk&via=Digg&text=This Is the First Instagram From North Korea

div.a: How Japan's Cyber Terrorist Lost A Game Of Cat And Mouse

div.div: A cat carrying a memory chip in its collar held the “code” to catch a cyber terrorist who made fools of Japan’s police and justice departments.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YucGyL&via=Digg&text=How Japan's Cyber Terrorist Lost A Game Of Cat And Mouse

div.a: Indian Rocket Launches Swarm Of International Mini Satellites

div.div: India successfully launched a Polar Satellite Launch Vehicle today, sending seven different international satellites into orbit.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/15JQHad&via=Digg&text=Indian Rocket Launches Swarm Of International Mini Satellites

div.a: 'Negro' No Longer To Appear On Census Forms

div.div: After more than a century, the Census Bureau is dropping its use of the word "Negro" to describe black Americans in surveys.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YtrcVu&via=Digg&text='Negro' No Longer To Appear On Census Forms

div.a: Sergey Brin's Brilliant Strategy To Make Glass Seem Normal

div.div: Since Google launched its reality-augmenting Project Glass in June, it’s been pretty much impossible find a picture of Google co-founder Sergei Brin in which he’s not wearing the futuristic eye-piece.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13i2bSA&via=Digg&text=Sergey Brin's Brilliant Strategy To Make Glass Seem Normal

div.div: BUNGA BUNGA IS A POLITICAL PARTY, RIGHT?

div.a: Everything You Need To Know About Italy’s Messed-Up Elections

div.div: Results from Italy’s election — held Sunday and Monday — are trickling in, and the winner is… nobody.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WeN1f1&via=Digg&text=Everything You Need To Know About Italy’s Messed-Up Elections

div.a: The Prison Where Inmates Are Treated Like People

div.div: On Bastoy prison island in Norway, the prisoners, some of whom are murderers and rapists, live in conditions that critics brand 'cushy' and 'luxurious'. Yet it has by far the lowest reoffending rate in Europe.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VHsMUL&via=Digg&text=The Prison Where Inmates Are Treated Like People

div.a: Doctor Pay In America And Other Countries

div.div: In Stephen Brill's monster healthcare article in Time this week, he argues that hospital executives are overpaid but doctors aren't. If we paid Medicare rates for all medical services, he says, "no doctor could hope for anything approaching the income he or she deserves." Here's the data.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XzfF5B&via=Digg&text=Doctor Pay In America And Other Countries

div.a: One Million Moms Claims New Geico Commercial 'Promotes Bestiality'

div.div: One Million Moms, a group that monitors children's programming, is calling on Geico to pull a recent commercial featuring a woman apparently flirting with a talking pig calling it 'bestiality.'

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Weeu0h&via=Digg&text=One Million Moms Claims New Geico Commercial 'Promotes Bestiality'

div.a: How To Make A Kill List

div.div: The reality is that when the United States government kills people on traditional and non-traditional battlefields — and it does so on a near daily basis — bureaucrats play a key role in the killings. America’s bureaucrats kill with amazing efficiency.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/15JskcE&via=Digg&text=How To Make A Kill List

div.a: What The Internet Did To Aaron Swartz

div.div: Aaron Swartz had been groomed to write that code since he was a child. It’s why what happened in his Brooklyn apartment, on that gray afternoon last January, may have been so inevitable.

div.div: NOT AS BAD AS THE VINE RESUME

div.a: Hacker Reveals Facebook Flaw That Exposed Private Information

div.div: Up until recently, Nir Goldshlager had access to anyone’s Facebook page.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/15JAGRy&via=Digg&text=Hacker Reveals Facebook Flaw That Exposed Private Information

div.a: Five-Cent Redemption

div.div: Among the five documentary shorts nominated for an Oscar this year is Redemption, a thirty-five minute film about New York City’s “canners”: the men, women, and children who collect bottles and cans from the city’s streets for their five-cent cash redemption value.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/136RGlv&via=Digg&text=Five-Cent Redemption

div.a: It Will Blow Your Mind To See How Much It Costs To Add One New Character To A Fighting Game

div.div: The next time you complain about there not being enough characters in a fighting game, take a look at what it takes to add one.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/15dFIEU&via=Digg&text=It Will Blow Your Mind To See How Much It Costs To Add One New Character To A Fighting Game

div.a: The Hostages 'Argo' Left Behind

div.div: “I slashed my wrists while in captivity in Iran.” 33 years ago, 52 Americans went through hell in Iran. Now they want justice.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XAJt1P&via=Digg&text=The Hostages 'Argo' Left Behind
